articles.content: Samsung Galaxy S23 FE and Galaxy Buds FE are confirmed to launch soon. As the South Korean brand gears up for the release of the new Fan Edition smartphone, speculation surrounding its features and s… [+1994 chars]

articles.title: More specs of the Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 FE duo appear online, will skip OLED panels - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Only the Plus model would support an S Pen. Samsung is expected to announce a raft of Fan Edition devices soon, including the Galaxy S23 FE smartphone,...
